[center][font size=4]Domoticz Change Log[/font][/center] [b]26.11.2016[/b] Initial Release.
Container.Name: domoticz
Container.Description: Domoticz is a Home Automation System that lets you monitor and configure various devices like: Lights, Switches, various sensors/meters like Temperature, Rain, Wind, UV, Electra, Gas, Water and much more. Notifications/Alerts can be sent to any mobile device. [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config/[/b] Where Domoticz stores configuration files[br] If you want to pass through a USB device, add the device using the Add another Path, Port or Variable in the bottom of this template.
Container.Overview: Domoticz is a Home Automation System that lets you monitor and configure various devices like: Lights, Switches, various sensors/meters like Temperature, Rain, Wind, UV, Electra, Gas, Water and much more. Notifications/Alerts can be sent to any mobile device.
